assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Digital Media Professionals Inc. engages in the intellectual property (IP) core license, product, and professional service business in Japan and internationally. The company licenses graphics processing units (GPU), and artificial intelligence (AI) related IP products; and develops and sells semiconductors and modules. It also offers low-load and high-precision license plate recognition software products; configurable AI inference processor IP, AI inference processor IP, and AI camera system small-size image signal processing IP hardware products. In addition, the company also provides ZIA C3 SoM, a platform for developing edge devices equipped with AI functions; and ZIA Cloud SAFE, a SaaS type cloud service. Further, it offers professional services, such as safety driving assistance system development, system design, board development, and AI solutions; 3D and 2D graphics GPU hardware products; and image processors. Digital Media Professionals Inc. was incorporated in 2002 and is headquartered in Tokyo, Japan.
